name: @emdgroup/react-storage
description: React hooks for convenient access to localStorage and sessionStorage APIs

scripts.docs:build: rm -rf docs README.md && yarn --silent typedoc --hideInPageTOC --excludeNotDocumented --disableSources --theme ../../node_modules/typedoc-github-wiki-theme/dist src/index.ts
scripts.docs: npm run docs:build && cp docs/Exports.md README.md

author: Moritz Onken <onken@netcubed.de>
